comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: Not much here to go on... the cowling appears to be all one color; I'm guessing it's Pacific-based judging from the pilot's uniform. The 310th Fighter Squadron, 58th FG used an orange-yellow cowling... the grease pencil annotation of the last time the engine was run (2-28-46?) indicates the bird was probably in temporary storage.
